page.title: 11INDUSTRY IN AYLESBURY
page.content: There is a lot of light {industry} in Aylesbury including Gatehouse, Rabans Lane and California Industrial estates. In Gatehouse Road there are the following firms: B.I.F's,D.C.A's, Rexels and Oral-B {laboratories}.Oral-B produce toothpaste, D.C.A. produce doughtnuts, Rexels produce{stationery} items.The products of this company are famous throughout the country.The t {factories} in Rabans Lane are: Helfen, Klockner Moeller, Papermate and British Telecom. Most of these companies produce electrical appliances and aerials. There are many other factories in Aylesbury such as: Schwarzkopf, Nestles, Hazell Watson and Viney, Antifence and Rothmans.
